title: Can we get more jungle enchantments?
body:
I feel like the four jungle enchantments we currently have don't quite fit all of the junglers. 

A crit jungle item would be awesome, for champs like Graves, Kindred, and Master Yi. It could build out of the jungle starter and Zeal, giving crit chance, a bit of attack speed, and maybe bonus damage when critting monsters.

A heal/shield power jungle item would be an interesting option. Ivern would actually finish his jungle item, and I could see other supportive junglers like Nunu taking it. 

I also think the red enchantment could use some love. Compared to the rest, it's rather bland. It only gives raw stats. Giving it a bleed effect or armor shred or something would help make it feel unique.
